ThingDef.label: shield generator
ThingDef.description:
A shielding device which projects a momentum repulsor field. Shots can go out, but not in.

Generates heat when it blocks attacks. If no heatsink capacity is available, the shield will be damaged and require repairs.

Captains are advised to drop shields once coolant reaches very high temperature, or risk heatsink damage.

ThingDef.label: miniaturized shield generator
ThingDef.description:
A small shielding device which projects a momentum repulsor field. Shots can go out, but not in.

Due to its small size, generates 125% of a standard shield generator's heat when it blocks attacks. If no heatsink capacity is available, the shield will be damaged and require repairs.

Captains are advised to drop shields once coolant reaches very high temperature, or risk heatsink damage.

ThingDef.Name: ShipHeatConduit
ThingDef.label: thermal conduit
ThingDef.description: A liquid conduit for moving heat around a starship.

ThingDef.label: heatsink
ThingDef.description:
A heatsink that slowly removes heat from the heat network. Will take damage if coolant gets near maximum heat capacity and release all heat stored if destroyed. Does not function if the ship is cloaked.

Heat capacity: 200Hu
Heat vented to space: 4Hu/s
Heat loss: 1Hu/s

ThingDef.label: large heatsink
ThingDef.description:
A large heatsink that slowly removes heat from the heat network. Will take damage if coolant gets near maximum heat capacity and release all heat stored if destroyed. Does not function if the ship is cloaked.

Heat capacity: 1000Hu
Heat vented to space: 16Hu/s
Heat loss: 3Hu/s

ThingDef.label: coolant tank
ThingDef.description:
A tank of coolant that stores excess heat produced by a ship. Slowly bleeds heat into the surrounding room if not in vacuum. Will take damage if coolant gets near maximum heat capacity and release all heat stored if destroyed.

Heat capacity: 800Hu
Heat loss: 2Hu/s

ThingDef.label: large coolant tank
ThingDef.description:
A large tank of coolant that stores excess heat produced by a ship. Slowly bleeds heat into the surrounding room if not in vacuum. Will take damage if coolant gets near maximum heat capacity and release all heat stored if destroyed.

Heat capacity: 4000Hu
Heat loss: 6Hu/s

ThingDef.label: emergency purge port
ThingDef.description: A system for channeling heat into low-melting-point metals like silver. Ejecting molten silver into space is a costly way to quickly purge stored heat. Shields will be dropped during a purge.

ThingDef.label: large emergency purge port
ThingDef.description: A system for rapidly channeling heat into low-melting-point metals like silver. Ejecting molten silver into space is a costly way to quickly purge stored heat. Shields will be dropped during a purge.

ThingDef.label: cannon turret
ThingDef.description: A starship turret that rapidly accelerates uranium slugs. Requires ammunition, but costs zero energy and very little heat to fire. Only useful at close range. Can be set to intercept torpedoes rather than firing at the enemy ship.\n\nRequires sufficient stored power and heat capacity to function.

ThingDef.label: autocannon
ThingDef.description: Ship cannon. Best used at short range.

ThingDef.label: large cannon turret
ThingDef.description: A large turret that rapidly accelerates uranium slugs. Requires ammunition, but costs zero energy and very little heat to fire. Only useful at close range.\n\nRequires sufficient stored power and heat capacity to function.

ThingDef.label: autocannon
ThingDef.description: Autocannon. Best used at short range.

ThingDef.label: artillery turret
ThingDef.description: A capital-class turret that rapidly accelerates a stream of massive uranium slugs. Requires ammunition, but costs zero energy and very little heat to fire. Only useful at close range.\n\nRequires sufficient stored power and heat capacity to function.

ThingDef.label: autocannon
ThingDef.description: Autocannon. Best used at short range.

ThingDef.label: laser turret
ThingDef.description: A starship turret that fires a powerful laser. While it can inflict devastating damage, it is only usable at short range. Can be set to intercept torpedoes rather than firing on the enemy ship.\n\nRequires sufficient stored power and heat capacity to function.

ThingDef.label: laser
ThingDef.description: Laser cannon. Short-ranged but devastating.

ThingDef.label: large laser turret
ThingDef.description: A large turret that fires a powerful laser. While it can inflict devastating damage, it is only usable at short range.\n\nRequires sufficient stored power and heat capacity to function.

ThingDef.label: laser
ThingDef.description: Laser cannon. Short-ranged but devastating.

ThingDef.label: plasma turret
ThingDef.description: A starship turret that fires a burst of superheated plasma. This balanced weapon can be used at up to medium range.\n\nRequires sufficient stored power and heat capacity to function.

ThingDef.label: plasma
ThingDef.description: Plasma cannon. Medium-range and balanced.

ThingDef.label: large plasma turret
ThingDef.description: A large turret that fires a burst of superheated plasma. This balanced weapon can be used at up to medium range.\n\nRequires sufficient stored power and heat capacity to function.

ThingDef.label: plasma
ThingDef.description: Plasma cannon. Medium-range and balanced.

ThingDef.label: railgun turret
ThingDef.description: A starship turret that accelerates metal slugs to relativistic speeds. Can hit targets at long range.\n\nRequires sufficient stored power and heat capacity to function.

ThingDef.label: railgun
ThingDef.description: Railgun. Best used at long range.

ThingDef.label: large railgun turret
ThingDef.description: A large turret that accelerates metal slugs to relativistic speeds. Capable of inaccurate fire at very long range.\n\nRequires sufficient stored power and heat capacity to function.

ThingDef.label: railgun
ThingDef.description: Railgun. Best used at long range.

ThingDef.label: spinal capacitor
ThingDef.description: The first segment of a spinal-mount weapon. Connects to one or more amplifiers, then a barrel.

ThingDef.label: spinal amplifier
ThingDef.description: A middle segment of a spinal-mount weapon. Attach one or more of these to an emitter, then add a barrel to complete the gun.\n\nIncreases base damage by 25%, but also increases power consumption and heat generated by the same percentage.

ThingDef.label: spinal barrel: laser
ThingDef.description: The final segment of a spinal-mount cannon. Should be placed outside the ship, unless you want a new hole in your hull.

ThingDef.label: spinal-mount cannon
ThingDef.description: Capital ship weaponry.

ThingDef.label: spinal barrel: plasma
ThingDef.description: The final segment of a spinal-mount cannon. Should be placed outside the ship, unless you want a new hole in your hull.

ThingDef.label: spinal-mount cannon
ThingDef.description: Capital ship weaponry.

ThingDef.label: spinal barrel: railgun
ThingDef.description: The final segment of a spinal-mount cannon. Should be placed outside the ship, unless you want a new hole in your hull.

ThingDef.label: spinal-mount cannon
ThingDef.description: Capital ship weaponry.

ThingDef.Name: BaseShipTorpedoWeapon
ThingDef.description: Torpedo launcher. Accurate and devastating against shields, but vulnerable to point-defense lasers.

ThingDef.label: torpedo launcher
ThingDef.description: Stores and launches torpedoes that are accurate and devastating, but slow to reach targets and vulnerable to point-defense lasers.\nTorpedo capacity: 7\nFire rate: 5/min

ThingDef.label: torpedo launcher (2)
ThingDef.description: Stores and launches torpedoes that are accurate and devastating, but slow to reach targets and vulnerable to point-defense lasers.\nTorpedo capacity: 14\nFire rate: 10/min

ThingDef.label: torpedo launcher (6)
ThingDef.description: Stores and launches torpedoes that are accurate and devastating, but slow to reach targets and vulnerable to point-defense lasers.\nTorpedo capacity: 28\nFire rate: 30/min
